name: Painter Looks Library
summary: Learn about .LOOKLIBRARY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Painter is an app that specializes in composing digital paint-like artwork. It provides various effects for dictating the appearance of paintbrushes, including gradients and flow maps. The look library in Painter organizes looks in one place you can access.
NOTE: You can add or remove looks in a library through the Media Library panel. To open this panel, select Window → Media Panels → Looks.

description: A LOOKLIBRARY file contains a collection of looks used by Corel Painter, a digital drawing application. It stores multiple media looks, which are images, such as neon streaks, vines, flowers, and branches, that users can add to the canvas. LOOKLIBRARY files are similar to .ABR Photoshop brushes.

instructions: You can open a LOOKLIBRARY file with Corel Painter. For example, to open a LOOKLIBRARY file, select Window → Media Panels → Looks, and click the "Import Look Library" icon.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .looklibrary file in Corel Painter 2023
images.caption: LOOKLIBRARY file open in Corel Painter 2023
